data.actual_result: Discord opens to a empty group DM named "Unnamed" (Reported for <@149505704569339904>)
data.expected_result: Discord should open to a direct message with said user
data.short_description: Discord opens up to a empty group DM called "Unnamed" when opening an "accepted your friend request" notificiation
data.steps_to_repro: - Open the Discord app and open up a DM or a server - Leave the app by going to your home screen, another app etc. - Press on a "<user> accepted your friend request" notification
